dialogue.text: YO! OJ, LOOK! IS THAT RYNO... LIKE... THE SUPER RARE ONE FROM MIST & STONE?!
Wait a sec... it looks exactly like the one I drew in The Book! It's real?!
Real and... intense. Feels kinda confused? Like a charging headache. PJ, you drew this thing?
Please maintain a safe distance, visitors. Unit 15, Ryno, can be highly unpredictable and aggressive.
Unpredictable? Awesome! High stats! Bet its bars hit harder than its charge! Let's GO!
PJ, I don't think 'bars' are its primary concern right now... It feels like it's about to flatten something.
